stepTitle: Two piloted satellites approach one another at a relative speed of $$0.250$$ $$\frac{m}{s}$$, intending to dock. The first has a mass of $$4{10}^3$$ kg, and the second a mass of $$7.5{10}^3$$ kg.
stepBody: If the two satellites collide elastically rather than dock, what is their final relative velocity?
